title: Handelmort Mansion

properties.name: description
properties.value: Handelmort Mansion is a mansion found in East Ardougne, just west of Ardougne market. It plays a large role in the Tribal Totem quest. Home to Lord Francis Kurt Handelmort, a wealthy East Ardougne noble, the mansion is richly decorated. It is also home to some artefacts that Lord Handelmort has taken. He has gone to great lengths to protect these artefacts with guard dogs, locked house, and a booby-trapped staircase.

Handelmort Mansion
Released30 April 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationEast Ardougne
Map
Advanced data
Typebuilding

Handelmort Mansion is a mansion found in East Ardougne, just west of Ardougne market. It plays a large role in the Tribal Totem quest. Home to Lord Francis Kurt Handelmort, a wealthy East Ardougne noble, the mansion is richly decorated. It is also home to some artefacts that Lord Handelmort has taken. He has gone to great lengths to protect these artefacts with guard dogs, locked house, and a booby-trapped staircase.
